lesson.title2: **The Solar System**: The Sun, planets, satellites, stars, and galaxies that make up our solar system.\n-
lesson.title3: **Key Concepts**: Understanding the structure of the solar system, celestial bodies, and their relationships.\n\n
lesson.title5: **Planets**: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune\n-
lesson.title6: **Satellites**: Moon, asteroids, comets, and other smaller objects that orbit planets.\n-
lesson.title7: **Stars**: The massive balls of hot, glowing gas that light up the universe.\n-
lesson.title8: **Galaxies**: Massive collections of stars, stellar remnants, interstellar gas, dust, and dark matter.\n\n
lesson.title10: **Composition**: Hydrogen and helium gases make up the majority of the Sun's mass.\n-
lesson.title11: **Size**: The Sun is approximately 109 times larger in diameter than Earth.\n-
lesson.title12: **Temperature**: The surface temperature of the Sun is about 5,500°C (10,000°F).\n\n
lesson.title14: **Types**: Main Sequence stars, Red Giants, White Dwarfs, Neutron Stars, and Black Holes.\n-
lesson.title15: **Life Cycle**: Stars go through various stages of evolution, from protostar to main sequence.\n\n
lesson.title17: **Composition**: Rock and metal, with a small amount of silicate minerals.\n-
lesson.title18: **Size**: The Moon is about one-quarter the size of Earth.\n-
lesson.title19: **Orbit**: The Moon orbits Earth in approximately 27.3 days.\n\n
lesson.title20: **Why Can't We See the Moon and Stars During the Day?**\n-
lesson.title21: **Light Reflection**: The Moon reflects sunlight, making it visible during the day.\n-
lesson.title22: **Atmospheric Interference**: The Earth's atmosphere scatters and absorbs some of the Sun's light, reducing visibility.\n-
lesson.title23: **Obstructions**: Objects on or near the Earth can block our view of the sky.\n\n
lesson.title26: **No One Can Live on This Heavenly Body**: Due to lack of air and water, making it uninhabitable for humans.\n-
lesson.title27: **Do and Learn**: Observe the shape of the Moon by drawing and writing about its changes over time." additional_kwargs={} response_metadata={'model': 'llama3.2:1b', 'created_at': '2025-01-07T13:46:53.252462186Z', 'done': True, 'done_reason': 'stop', 'total_duration': 117194993958, 'load_duration': 32958377, 'prompt_eval_count': 1956, 'prompt_eval_duration': 42835000000, 'eval_count': 451, 'eval_duration': 74323000000, 'message': Message(role='assistant', content='', images=None, tool_calls=None)} id='run-285fc844-9eb4-477c-8c1c-8466e3dd33d9-0' usage_metadata={'input_tokens': 1956, 'output_tokens': 451, 'total_tokens': 2407}
